metadata.name: Alpha Wave Visions NFT Collection: The Revenant #1
metadata.description: A collection of Audio-reactive generative art revealing the visions of those who tried the Alpha Wave Experience. Vision of someone who passed away coming back to talk to you through a TV glitch. Created by Alpha Wave Experience art collective. Generative Art: Dimitri Thouzery. Music: Toga Fidan / Dan Ghenacia
